Minister Paul Goldsmith serenades Auckland crowd on piano for arts festival https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/minister-paul-goldsmith-serenades-auckland-crowd-on-piano-for-arts-festival/7K3IWP7YD5DCJOAUZ72MIDCI7Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/minister-paul-goldsmith-serenades-auckland-crowd-on-piano-for-arts-festival/7K3IWP7YD5DCJOAUZ72MIDCI7Y/ The performance was part of this year's Auckland Arts Festival. Photo / Alex Burton
